title: Southward ho!: in New Zealand's beautiful South Island
brief_description: A travelogue of the South Island showing Queen Charlotte Sound, fishing and picnics, Nelson City and car services to west coast, lakes, glaciers, ferns, Franz Josef Glacier, Christchurch, River Avon, Canterbury College, Lyttleton (port of Christchurch and southern terminus for express steamer service) and much more.
